Bollywood Lauds Deepika Padukone And Meghna Gulzar For The Accurate First Look Of 'Chhapaak'
Bollywood Lauds Deepika Padukone And Meghna Gulzar For The Accurate First Look Of 'Chhapaak'
In last few years, a lot of things have changed in Bollywood. Apart from audience opening up-to quality content and being receptive to compelling stories, filmmakers too are ready to take risks.
On such risk is taken by Meghna Gulzar and Deepika Padukone. Apart from acting in Chhapaak, Deepika will also be donning the producer's hat for this one. Today, Deepika shared the first look as an acid attack survivor and people are impressed. Her friends from the film fraternity started pouring lovely messages.
Here are the first reactions and all of them are positive. Apart from lauding Deepika Padukone, celebrities are praising Meghna Gulzar for the factual accuracies. Read on!
WOW! 👏👏👏 @deepikapadukone
(and whoever thought of the name CHAHAPAAK should be given an award right now) https://t.co/5k9rBhhHd0 — sujoy ghosh (@sujoy_g) March 25, 2019
Don't Miss 460 SHARES 1.7 K SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES
This is brilliant. Can’t wait to see you as #Malti. It’s path breaking. More power to you Deepika. ❤️🤗 https://t.co/Shu5QqoVSP — Rajkummar Rao (@RajkummarRao) March 25, 2019
All the best as you’ll begin this new journey @deepikapadukone @meghnagulzar @foxstarhindi waiting to know this story 🙌🏼❤️ https://t.co/nLXgKVRnAJ — Kiara Advani (@Advani_Kiara) March 25, 2019
[Instagram] Love pouring in for Deepika Padukone's first look for #Chhapaak ❤❤ Comments from Varun Dhawan, Rajkummar Rao, Vicky Kaushal, Jacqueline Fernandes, Parineeti Chopra, Huma Qureshi and more #DeepikaBeginsChhapaak pic.twitter.com/eVLPsW7Uo7 — Deepika Padukone FC (@DeepikaPFC) March 25, 2019
Beautiful. @deepikapadukone @meghnagulzar & the entire team deserve to be given credit for this remarkably accurate visual portrayal. https://t.co/LCUg6SfU9m — Arjun Kapoor (@arjunk26) March 25, 2019
All the best as you’ll begin this new journey @deepikapadukone @meghnagulzar @foxstarhindi waiting to know this story 🙌🏼❤️ https://t.co/nLXgKVRnAJ — Kiara Advani (@Advani_Kiara) March 25, 2019
The film will hit the theatres on January 10, 2020.
